title: Kontrol Esports LF Mid. Diamond+
body:
Hello I am the owner and founder of KontrolEsports. The team has decided it is time to get us a League of Legends Diamond team. This team will be the Org's priority. We are really excited in recruiting new players. Our goal is challenger series. If you are not willing to work hard as a team to make it there do not apply. Fill out and comment the application below.

IGN:
Time Zone:
Name you would like to be called:
Availability:
Past team experience:
Role:
Extra information:
About you:

replies.body:
IGN: RiseOverHate
Time Zone: Eastern 
Name you would like to be called: Hate
Availability: Most days after three pm est. Will let know before hand if needed off. 
Past team experience: played with a team called RZA for a couple months before personnel leave. 
Role: Support/Adc
Extra information: I am committed to working with a team to get better. 
About you: I am a really cool guy and would love to get better at the game and hopefully go pro.

IGN: selfz
Time Zone: est
Name you would like to be called: selfz or z
Availability: everyday after 8pm
Past team experience: couple of teams, mostly in d1+ teams when I played seriously
Role: mid
Extra information:
About you:

IGN: Ð0XA
Time Zone: EST
Name you would like to be called: Will, but D0XA is pref 
Availability: I have time after 1:30 EST 
Past team experience: I been in one other competive team and I played over 5+ Games vs. Diamond/Platinum players
Role: Mid 
Extra information: Im extremely active on league, and I can be flexable for scrim or practice times
About you: I like to admit my mistakes and fix them for future games
